mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APT_LTTOT_PBLANC_DETAIL ( apt_apply_no, bsns_mby_nm, cnstrct_entrps_nm, cntrct_cncls_bgnde, cntrct_cncls_endde, gnrl_rnk1_crsparea_rcept_pd, gnrl_rnk1_etc_area_rcptde_pd, gnrl_rnk1_etc_gg_rcptde_pd, gnrl_rnk2_crsparea_rcept_pd, gnrl_rnk2_etc_area_rcptde_pd, gnrl_rnk2_etc_gg_rcptde_pd, hmpg_adres, house_dtl_secd, house_dtl_secd_nm, house_manage_no, house_nm, house_secd, house_secd_nm, hssply_adres, hssply_zip, imprmn_bsns_at, lrscl_bldlnd_at, mdat_trget_area_secd, mdhs_telno, mvn_prearnge_ym, npln_prvopr_public_house_at, parcprc_uls_at, pblanc_no, przwner_presnatn_de, public_house_earth_at, rcept_bgnde, rcept_endde, rcrit_pblanc_de, rent_secd, rent_secd_nm, speclt_rdn_earth_at, spsply_rcept_bgnde, spsply_rcept_endde, subscrpt_area_code, subscrpt_area_code_nm, tot_suply_hshldco ) VALUES( APT_SQ_NO.NEXTVAL, #{bsns_mby_nm},#{cnstrct_entrps_nm},#{cntrct_cncls_bgnde},#{cntrct_cncls_endde},#{gnrl_rnk1_crsparea_rcept_pd}, #{gnrl_rnk1_etc_area_rcptde_pd},#{gnrl_rnk1_etc_gg_rcptde_pd},#{gnrl_rnk2_crsparea_rcept_pd},#{gnrl_rnk2_etc_area_rcptde_pd},#{gnrl_rnk2_etc_gg_rcptde_pd}, #{hmpg_adres},#{house_dtl_secd},#{house_dtl_secd_nm},#{house_manage_no},#{house_nm}, #{house_secd},#{house_secd_nm},#{hssply_adres},#{hssply_zip},#{imprmn_bsns_at}, #{lrscl_bldlnd_at},#{mdat_trget_area_secd},#{mdhs_telno},#{mvn_prearnge_ym},#{npln_prvopr_public_house_at}, #{parcprc_uls_at},#{pblanc_no},#{przwner_presnatn_de},#{public_house_earth_at},#{rcept_bgnde}, #{rcept_endde},#{rcrit_pblanc_de},#{rent_secd},#{rent_secd_nm},#{speclt_rdn_earth_at}, #{spsply_rcept_bgnde},#{spsply_rcept_endde},#{subscrpt_area_code},#{subscrpt_area_code_nm},#{tot_suply_hshldco} )

INSERT INTO APT_LTTOT_PBLANC_MDL ( etc_hshldco, house_manage_no, house_ty, instt_recomend_hshldco, lfe_frst_hshldco, lttot_top_amount, mnych_hshldco, model_no, nwwds_hshldco, old_parnts_suport_hshldco, pblanc_no, spsply_hshldco, suply_ar, suply_hshldco, transr_instt_enfsn_hshldco ) VALUES( #{etc_hshldco},#{house_manage_no},#{house_ty},#{instt_recomend_hshldco},#{lfe_frst_hshldco}, #{lttot_top_amount},#{mnych_hshldco},#{model_no},#{nwwds_hshldco},#{old_parnts_suport_hshldco}, #{pblanc_no},#{spsply_hshldco},#{suply_ar},#{suply_hshldco},#{transr_instt_enfsn_hshldco} )

INSERT INTO APPLY_NOTICE ( rnum, bbs_sn, ccr_cnnt_sys_ds_cd, ais_tp_cd_nm, bbs_tl, dep_nm, bbs_wou_dttm, link_url, bbs_dtl_cts ) VALUES( #{rnum},#{bbs_sn},#{ccr_cnnt_sys_ds_cd},#{ais_tp_cd_nm},#{bbs_tl}, #{dep_nm},#{bbs_wou_dttm},#{link_url},#{bbs_dtl_cts} )
